Its capital city is also named Kayanza. ==Communes== It is divided into the following communes: * Commune of Butaganzwa * Commune of Gahombo * Commune of Gatara * Commune of Kabarore * Commune of Kayanza * Commune of Matongo * Commune of Muhanga * Commune of Muruta * Commune of Rango ==References== Category:Provinces of Burundi
title: Kayanza Province
